mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manualtool mt JOIN member m ON mt.mem_num = m.mem_num

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM(SELECT mt.man_num, mt.man_champion, mt.man_season,
REPLACE(REPLACE(mt.man_title, '<', '<'), '>', '>') man_title,
m.mem_nick, mt.man_update, mt.man_hit
FROM manualtool mt JOIN member_detail m ON mt.mem_num = m.mem_num ORDER BY mt.man_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT mar_num, mar_content, TO_CHAR(mar_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') mar_date, man_num, mem_num FROM manualtool_reply where man_num=#{man_num}) r JOIN member_detail m USING(mem_num) ORDER BY r.mar_num DESC)m)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
